name: Shadow Gear
description:
Get in, loser! Join Johnny Sweetheart and his even sweeter ride through the post-apocalyptic desert as raiders majorly harsh his mellow. Who's Johnny Sweetheart you ask? Just a guy with a pink 'hawk with no hecks to give! But is he in for more than he bargained for? Just when he thinks it's all over, Johnny gets some help from a mysterious friend... himself?!?

Made during the 2022 Global Game Jam. Work in progress. Stay tuned.
